Course Staff.name: Alan Liang
Course Staff.blurb: Hi! I am a EECS Masters student, previously having majored in Economics and CS at Cal. I’m sort of from Shanghai, and this semester I also teach ECON 140. Some things I enjoy include discovering good food, shibes, consumerism, and data science; guess which one is my favorite ;’) Looking forward to a great semester and e-meeting you all!

Course Staff.name: Amal Bhatnagar
Course Staff.blurb: Amal is a Senior originally from Atlanta. He loves to hike, write and play basketball. A fun fact about him is that he's publishing a book about data science in venture capital this semester. Come to office hours to learn more!

Course Staff.name: Andrei Caprau
Course Staff.blurb: Hi everyone, I’m a 5th year majoring in Economics, Data Science, and Computer Science. I also teach Econ 140 this semester. I hope everyone enjoys our class as much as we enjoy teaching it!

Course Staff.name: Chris Pyles
Course Staff.blurb: Hi! I'm a fourth-year CS + DS major, and I also teach Data 100. Looking forward to meeting everyon this semester!

Course Staff.name: Matthew Yep
Course Staff.blurb: Hi my name is Matthew, and I’m a junior studying economics and data science. I like to watch the NBA, play Settlers of Catan, and have been learning how to fish during lockdown.

Course Staff.name: Rohan Jha
Course Staff.blurb: Hey! I actually just took this course last semester and so I have a pretty recent experience with what it’s like to take this course - feel free to hmu for tips on how to succeed. Other than that, I’m an international kid from Dubai who’s into boxing, casual philosophy (in other words, I hate essays) and having new experiences (feel free to reach out to me with any ideas lol).  Looking forward to meeting y’all this semester.

Course Staff.name: Avantika Ghosh
Course Staff.blurb: Hello, my name is Avantika Ghosh and I am a 2nd year student studying Computer Science and Economics. As one of your Connector Assistants in Data 88E, I am very excited to delve deeper into the exciting world of Data Science and Economics this Spring with all of you! I look forward to meeting everyone in my Office Hours.

Course Staff.name: Sreeja Apparaju
Course Staff.blurb: Hello! My name is Sreeja and I’m a sophomore studying Economics and Computer Science. I took this course during my first semester and this will be my second time CA’ing it. I enjoy caffeinated drinks, board games and anything to do with food. I am really excited meet y’all this semester! (Please don’t forget to wear your face masks and stay safe!)
